tests.title: should load the home page correctly
tests.fullTitle: Expense Tracker Tests should load the home page correctly
tests.code:
cy.contains('Expense Tracker'); // Check if the heading is present
cy.get('h1').should('have.text', 'Expense Tracker');

err.message: AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: expected '[ <h1.MuiTypography-root.MuiTypography-body1.css-19pioh1-MuiTypography-root>, 5 more... ]' to have text 'Expense Tracker', but the text was 'Expense TrackerWallet Balance:Expenses:Recent TransactionsNo transactions!Top Expenses'
